embeds.title: What is kumi?
embeds.description: The Kumi brand was founded and launched first product in August 2019 through collaboration. between pediatric allergists and chemists who want to develop natural, gentle mosquito repellent products Can be used with young children While maintaining good mosquito repellent performance, we collaborated to invent and develop the Kumi formula. Ricebutter Balm is created by selecting natural ingredients such as rice butter, shallot, etc. Free from various harmful substances.
